articles.title: Mahakumbh Mela: Thirty killed in crush at India's Kumbh Mela festival - BBC.com
articles.description: Pilgrims rushing to take part in ritual bathing trampled over people on the banks of the Ganges.
articles.content:
Vikas Pandey and Samira Hussain
Zoya Mateen
The crush has people anxiously waiting at lost and found centres at the Kumbh Mela
At least 30 peoplehave been killed in a crush at the world's largest … [+6975 chars]
